links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 1006
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1,2).
formula: Recurrence: {a(1)=0, a(0)=1, a(2)=1, 2*a(n)+a(n+1)-a(n+3)=0}.Sum(-1/52*(-3-17*_alpha+2*_alpha^2)*_alpha^(-1-n), _alpha=RootOf(_Z^2+2*_Z^3-1))a(n) = sum{k=0..floor(n/2), C(k,n-2k)2^(n-2k)}. - _Paul Barry_, Oct 16 2004If p[1]=0, p[2]=1, p[3]=2, p[i]=0, (i>3), and if A is Hessenberg matrix of order n defined by: A[i,j]=p[j-i+1], (i<=j), A[i,j]=-1, (i=j+1), and A[i,j]=0 otherwise. Then, for n>=1, a(n-1)=det A. - _Milan Janjic_, May 02 2010
crossrefs: Column k=2 of A219946. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Dec 01 2012
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jun 05 2000
